data.title: Duo plan
data.text:
Premium Duo is a discount plan for 2 people who live together.

Plan members have separate accounts with Premium features

The plan manager pays for the plan

The plan manager handles additions and removals for members

Additionally, plan managers get hours of audiobooks listening time per month from our audiobooks subscriber catalog.

Note: Only the plan manager has access to the audiobook listening time per billing period from our audiobooks subscriber catalog. It’s not possible to share audiobook listening time with the plan member/s.

Manage Premium Duo

Note: The plan manager can’t be changed once the plan is created.

Join or leave a Duo plan

Note: Plan members can only change plans once every 12 months.

You need to be logged into your own Spotify account and have received an invite link to join.

You need to be living with the plan manager

Enter the same address as the plan manager upon joining the plan
